title: Have you heard of Trials of Ascension?

embed.description: Forged Chaos is raising funds for Trials of Ascension on Kickstarter! We want to put the "RPG" back in "MMORPG"!

body:
Hey guys, just wondering if anyone else has heard of or has been paying attention to the indie MMORPG, 'Trials of Ascension'? It's recently just come to Kickstarter.

Trials of Ascension is an MMORPG that seeks to create a world where you can live through your character and actually contribute to that world. The developers have said that they aren’t trying to make a game that pleases everyone, which I think is really commendable considering the current state of MMORPGs. There are many unique aspects to this game (that may or may not be worrying for people who haven't experienced it), so I encourage everyone to look into this game and to join the discussion.

I have been a member of the ToA community for a while now, and honestly the community and developers are amazing and kind people (the staff at Forged Chaos are as equally awesome as our OCE staff).

I'm more than happy to answer questions or provide links/etc to any questions you guys might have.

The link is a referral link (http://trialsofascension.com/ks.php?ref=197461) - so if you don’t feel comfortable using me as your referee to the Kickstarter campaign, an alternative link is here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/forgedchaos/trials-of-ascension

It would appear that it would be around $12 USD a month. They are also considering $8/month and $15/month.
